name: mars-rover-mission-control
description: Interactive NASA Mars Rover Data Visualization - Professional mission control interface

scripts.build:analyze: npm run build && npx serve -s build -p 3001
scripts.lint: echo 'No linting configured - add ESLint for production use'
scripts.format: echo 'No formatting configured - add Prettier for production use'
scripts.setup: npm install && echo 'âœ… Mars Rover Mission Control setup complete! Run npm start to launch.'
scripts.health-check: curl -f http://localhost:5000 || echo 'Server not running. Run npm start first.'
scripts.clean: rm -rf build node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.postbuild: echo 'ðŸš€ Build complete! Ready for deployment.'
